entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proxy authentication seems to not work with proxies that are not Fiddler #82743
  • Cast exception in ImmutableCollections.DoNotCallToImmutableCollectionOnAnImmutableCollectionValueAnalyzer on Preview 1 SDK #82741
  • `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` empty `Content.Headers.ContentLength` when using `AutomaticDecompression` #82737
  • Size regression in Minimal API NativeAOT app #82732
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not support custom property names through JsonPropertyNameAttribute #82730
  • Assertion failed '(igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader)' #82729
  • Implementation of Parallel.ForEachAsync for .NET Standard 2.0 #82727
  • What is the C# equivalent code for the Powershell sript to remove user from Adminstrators group? #82726
  • [wasm] WBT tests binary incompatible with newer emscripten #82725
    8.0.0
  • Add generic JsonPropertyInfo metadata type(s) #82720
    Future
  • Investigate whether to increase file descriptor limit in NativeAOT process #82719
    Future
  • Support new overload for ObjCRuntime.Selector.GetHandle in the AOT compiler #82717
  • Blazor WebAssembly suffers memory leaks from compiled expressions #82716
  • NET 7 new GC high lock contention #82715
    8.0.0
  • RSA-PSS on iOS should use native APIs #82714
    8.0.0
  • Runtime repository is missing 7.0.3 release #82712
  • Stream aborted if `QuicStream.WriteAsync` cancellation token is canceled after `WriteAsync` completes #82704
  • JIT: Allow comparing GC pointers with `ccmp` #82703
  • Changing collection in CollectionChanged event results in exception #82699
  • InterpolationMode.NearestNeighbor crops half a pixel of the image drawn #82695
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CrlBuilderTests.LoadPreservesUnknownExtensions #82694
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestChainTests.CreateChain_RSA #82693
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #82692
  • [wasi][mono] Support targeting wasi in AOT compiler #82691
    8.0.0
  • Test failure profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd #82690

Closed

  • [release/7.0][wasm] `RollForward` needed for `WasmAppHost` on `release/7.0` branch #79313
    7.0.x
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest test timeout #79200
  • MSBuild warnings when building runtime test projects #70658
    8.0.0
  • 🎉 Annual dotnet/runtime community survey 2023 🎉 #81866
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests timing out in the CI on x64 macOS #80010
    8.0.0
  • . net7.0 nativeaot suggestions #82636
  • VectorNNN<T>.Sqrt missing test coverage and unspecified behavior #81915
  • Executing a SOAP rating service request in a .NET 7 COM-enabled assembly fails with 'The given assembly name was invalid' #82640
  • Casting double to float returns strange number, with difference of nearly 8 units #82402
  • Half type Max/Min value is different from documentation #82508
  • [API Proposal]: Make Parallel.For method support function pointers #82522
  • [Test] Fake issue to test that the issue labeler is applying labels again. In this case, area-System.Numerics. Generic Math, UInt128, Decimal32, BigInteger. #82721
  • Sample to customize what STJ considers a 'JSON null'/Ignoring property writing #82530
  • [wasm] Make WasmMainJSPath optional #63465
    8.0.0
  • TypeLoadException when struct contains nullable static field of itself #79636
  • TypeLoadException when instance of type "A" with a field(s) of type "GenericType<A>" #82701
  • AnyAll.cs optimizations for Any and All taking predicates in parameter #82705
  • System.Management fails at runtime on Win10/ARM64 #59844
    Future
  • X509Certificate2 constructor throws exception only on macOS when a byte blob with multiple certificates is decoded #82682

PullRequests

Created

  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add support for skipping workloads testing for previous versions #82742
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Workloads
  • Rewrite exception handler if retval is a pointer #82740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a null serviceProvider #82739
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Correct "abstact" to "abstract". #82738
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use windows.vs2022.amd64.open for stress tests #82736
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-preview2] Versions.props: Increment package versions for 6.0, and 7.0 #82735
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Workloads
  • Track down analyzer failure 2 #82734
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-codeflow
  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use SecurityTransforms for RSA+PSS #82728
    area-System.Security, os-ios
  • Stop incrementing class profile counter once the reservoir table is full #82723
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] add test of download re-try into advanced sample #82722
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Ignore the property with JsonIgnore when generating source code #82718
    community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where caller requires no initialization #82711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Pass wasi invariant mode through env variable #82707
    arch-wasm
  • Fold canonical templates into canonically equivalent types #82700
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable symbol stripping for crossgen2 #82698
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Annotation changes only (part 3) #82697
  • Trim managed debugging support code #82696
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Split generic virtual method slot use and impl tracking #82222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace IlcHostArch with SDK-computed value #82645
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Prevent tests from importing "normal" NuGet props/targets #80573
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoid creating csproj during compilation time #82724
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasi] Build cross compiler for wasi. #82702
  • [wasm] don't call export_internal twice #82713
  • Fix pthread_cond_wait race on macOS #82709
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Set VSDebugger_ValidateDotnetDebugLibSignatures #82710
    dev-innerloop
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • pal_console.c: cast TIOCSWINSZ to int when `HAVE_IOCTL_WITH_INT_REQUEST` #82676
    community-contribution
  • Typo in DeniedValuesAttribute #82665
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Permit trailing data when parsing an X.509 certificate by DER content #82688
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Emit llvm intrinsic declarations lazily. #82519
  • Fix juxtaposed command - correct value is noted in eng\build.ps1 #81572
    community-contribution
  • Fix links in Portable PDB spec #82683
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll #82618
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Bump main PreReleaseVersionIteration to 3 #82658
    area-Infrastructure
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Add an internal GC lock API #82646
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][icu][libraries] Load full ICU in library tests only when it's necessary #82619
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable adaptive loop alignment for known hot methods #82635
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after download retry #82617
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Test new chrome version. #82109
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Handle the remainder in MemoryExtensions.Count vectorized #82687
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unify arm64 and x64 GT_SELECT handling #82610
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter trace entry point selection heuristic #82604
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • Add PeriodicTimer.Period property #82560
    area-System.Threading
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Try skipping generation of empty method dictionaries #82591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow wildcards when looking for nodes #82386
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

Merged

    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch is not picking up changes on .cshtml files using Razor Pages #30909
  • dotnet restore fails for .NET 8 preview 1 SDK due to missing NuGet package dependency #30897
  • SelfContained projects need to set Runtime Identifier after .Net upgrade from 7.0.103 -> 7.0.200 #30894

Closed

  • 🎉 Annual dotnet/sdk community survey 2023 🎉 #30518
  • dotnet publish -p:PublishSingleFile fails with Unhandled exception on .net 7 it works on .net 6 #30758
  • vstest command no longer allows multiple loggers #30034
  • [GenAPI] Do not synthesize generic fields of inaccessible type #30627
  • GenAPI: Filter out generic base interfaces if type argument/s are filtered out. #30805
  • What is the difference between dotnet SDK 7.0.103 and dotnet SDK 7.0.200 #30727

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor hosted #30908
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30906
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30899
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Revert MSBuild to match VS 17.5.0 GA #30674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.2xx
  • [Breaking Backport] Fix Encoding On Non EN Languages #30823
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Servicing-approved, Area-DotNet Test
  • [7.0.2xx Servicing] Fix Property Parsing in `publish` and `pack` #30826
  • GenAPI: do not synthesize generic fields of inaccessible type #30889
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30857
  • GenAPI: Filter out generic base interfaces if type argument/s are filtered out. #30851
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2123929 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
    Area-CLI
  • Remove scrubbing the warning for furhter observation #30841

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense "Show Items From Unimported Namespaces" Sort Order Leads To Unwanted Using Directives #67081
    17.6 P3
  • File-scoped IsExternalInit type is used in modreq for `init` accessors #67079
  • Inlinehints options could be simplified. #67075
  • vs/ide/vbcs/diagnostics/analyzerperformanceinfo telemetry event needs to be aggregated #67074
    17.6 P3
  • `NullReferenceException` in `RefSafetyAnalysis.GetValEscape` #67070
    17.5
  • API for retrieving a LINQ expression tree given a Roslyn IOperation tree #67069
  • Optimize `ToDisplayString` to not allocate `SymbolDisplayPart` arrays #67067

Closed

  • No C# experience in cloud environments when opening a folder #41330
    Backlog
  • The analyzer assembly references version '4.6.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.5.0.0' #66918
  • ❓ Survey: Roslyn repo contribution experience 2023 #66823
  • Intellisense shows wrong argument description on overloads if first suggestion is params #66984
  • Test issue #67072

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #67082
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2123971 #67077
  • Exclude CSharp.EditorFeature from vs_perf_designtime_ide_searchtest #67076
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Extract remote keep-alive code into its own component #67073
    Area-IDE
  • Bump Microsoft.ServiceHub.Framework to 4.2.70-beta #67071
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Improve the caching logic in OOP DiagnosticComputer #67068
    Tenet-Performance, Performance-Scenario-Responsiveness, 17.6
  • Portability #67066
    Community

Merged

  • Results of running 'make member readonly' on IDE #66957
    Next
  • Move to "UseDeconstruction" to `VerifyCS` #67052
    Community, Next
  • Up the priority of the 'fix formatting' fixer to 'high' #67058
    Next
  • Parameterize tests in VisualStudioOptionStorageTests #66935
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Bump references to release version #67032
  • Fix signature help parameter selection #66988
    Next
  • Switch to frozen snapshots for design attribute checking. #67063
    Next

Updated

  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Update tests to use raw strings #67059
  • Fix VisualStudioSettingsOptionPersister issues and increase test coverage #67064
  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Improve the spans that 'add parameter check' is supported in #67004
  • Removed "sealed" from base class #64983
    Area-IDE
  • Don't show expanded items in certain scenarios #67049
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Port Rename and Formatting tests to the new framework #67020
  • Fix semicolon placement in statement-placement fixer #66610
    Area-IDE
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrading Visual Studio from 17.3 to 17.5 causes Blazor errors in the console #46918
  • Consider reducing code duplication across core assemblies #46915
  • Perf regression: mapaction #46914
  • Perf improvement: https #46913
  • Difference between StringValue parameter handling in RDF and RDG #46912
  • ASP0019 should not fire if code guards with ContainsKey() #46907
  • Kestrel windows authentication prompts for the credentials #46905

Closed

  • iisexpresstray crashes when starting a site from visual studio 2022 17.5.0 #46851
  • Survey: Repo Contribution Experience 2023 #46571
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #46897
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, mapaction, plaintext #46895
  • Perf regression: mapaction #46899
  • Support simple parameter-binding scenarios in RequestDelegateGenerator #46275
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: json, json #46884
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #46894

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid trying to use _hotReloadAgent variable before it is initialized #46916
    area-blazor
  • Correct a few nullable annotations #46911
    area-runtime
  • Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #46910
    area-signalr
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a2880db` to `0b40b4f` #46901
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Add shared test infra for RDF and RDG #46838
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7a7231c` to `3d787f5` #46900
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Update template spelling and wording #46886
    area-mvc
  • fix github issue #46864 #46876
    area-security, community-contribution
  • JsonSubKeyClaim arrays #46878
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add support for indented text writer to RDG #46845
    area-web-frameworks
  • Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #46769
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Tidy up some irregularities in certificate reloading #46819
    area-runtime
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2123920 #46893
    area-mvc
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [dotnet-trace] Add option to stop tracing on trigger #3125

  • What is the future for dotnet-counters list? #3626

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor input dropdown list not accepting selected value #13586
    Backlog
  • Setter using DynamicResource is not reapplied when related trigger condition is updated #13585
    Backlog
  • BindableLayout not showing up items for the first time #13577
    Backlog
  • error XA4310: not found '$(AndroidSi gningKeyStore)' file 'myapp.keystore' #13576
  • Tabbed pages with mapsui map do not work on Android but do on windows #13575
  • UI freezing when performing frequent mouse action in different HTML input element in MAUI app #13573
    Backlog
  • There is a missing value in the return value of the GetPlacemarksAsync method. #13572
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor app webview becomes randomly unresponsive on windows after upgrading to net7 from net6 #13584
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.RuntimeException Message=Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap android.graphics.Bitmap@5d9bccf #13534
  • TableSection TextColor does not work with DynamicResource #8487
  • Exception when adding a child view to AbsoluteLayout, then removing it, and then adding it again. #12074
  • Setting IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate programmatically doesn't work #12180
  • Maui Drawer #12240
  • [CollectionView] [Windows] memory leaks when ItemsSource has changed #13393
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Word/Pdf document print dialog #13569
  • [macOS] Multi-window app does not terminate #13561

Created

Merged

  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #13579
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.230118.102 to 1.2.230217.4 #13508
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.4.0 to 4.5.0 #13580
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251

  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #12768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #13358
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [windows] fix memory leak when `CollectionView.ItemsSource` changes #13530
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃

Updated

  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    community ✨
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `BindableLayout` #13550
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Add legacy Grid method (and a better one) #13408
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use the launcher to start the Windows camera #13220
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Fixed ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method #13512
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30358
  • InversePropertyAttribute swaps principal/dependent in 1:1 self referencing relationship #30355
  • How to find computed column in Changetracker #30354
  • SplitQuery add transaction settings with isolation level #30353
  • How can i customize the dbcontext by adding arguments to its constructors, using adddbcontextpool registration #30350
  • Error when creating a new migration "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: EntityId" #30349
  • migrations bundles. #30348

Closed

  • Add calculated properties unmapped to database #30319
  • Understanding PooledDbContextFactory #30356
  • Survey: GitHub contributor experience 2023 for dotnet/efcore #30242
    Discussions
  • Cannot install dotnet-ef tools - error NU1202: Package dotnet-ef 7.0.3 is not compatible with net60 (.NETFramework,Version=v6.0) #30341

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-27
entry.content:
